Welcome! My name is Micah Tinife, my passion is using my knowledge as a Software Engineer to solve problems worth solving.

My goal is to use my knowledge of Software Engineering to create mine and others dreams. To have the ability create thoughtful and important pieces of technology, that solve the problems they need to. My long-term goal is to take my tech knowledge to areas that don't have it or I could help improve. Also, to help easy the understanding of tech and software to those that wish to learn it.
